name: ThreeSecondHorrorStories
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three second horror stories
des: It is a dark and stormy night. You sit alone on the couch, the dark slowly setting in around you. You hear creaking above you, wait! Was that a footstep? You ask Alexa to tell you a story, to distract you. She tells you a random small horror story to keep you occupied, but only for a few seconds. You wonder when Alexa is done speaking, did those footsteps get closer?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
